text: @realDonaldTrump So you want to be the president, that allows a plague to run rampant, crashed the economy, has the worst unemployment numbers since the Great Depression, tarnished our global reputation,and started a civil war🤔. #isthiswinning  #riots2020 #COVID19 #economy #ResignNowTrump

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
